    • formatLabel

      public static void formatLabel(JLabel inputLabel, String inputContent)
      Format a JLabel that contains content.
      The text of the label is set to the standard style, and its value is set to the contents of inputContent.
      Parameters:
      inputLabel - The JLabel to modify
      inputContent - The contents of the label message

    • formatLabel

      public static void formatLabel(JLabel inputLabel)
      Format a JLabel that contains no content.
      The text of the label is stylized and set to indicate it has no value.
      Parameters:
